pr_title: chore(deps): update dependency org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin to v3

timeline.message: chore(deps): update dependency org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin to v3

timeline.bodyText:
The CI (and tests) does not validate this change. I confirmed the command below works with 3.0.0:
~/cloud-opensource-java/dashboard $ mvn exec:java -Dexec.arguments="-f ../boms/cloud-oss-bom/pom.xml"
timeline.author: suztomo
